original_text: Then will the Lord drive out all these nations from before you, and ye shall possess greater nations and mightier than yourselves.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 모든 나라 백성을 너희 앞에서 다 쫓아내실 것이라 너희가 너희보다 강대한 나라들을 차지할 것인즉

sentences.original_text: Then will the Lord drive out
all these nations from before you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 앞에 있는 모든 이 민족들을

sentences.original_text: greater nations and mightier than yourselves
